title: Send a Personalized Offer
description: A customer who frequently buys a specific brand of coffee has not purchased it in a while. The marketing system automatically sends them a personalized offer.

tasks.description: A system job identifies customers who meet the criteria for the 'Lapsed Purchaser' campaign.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system generates a list of customers to target.

tasks.description: The system generates a unique, single-use coupon for '25% off your next coffee purchase'.
tasks.expected_outcome: A personalized offer is created for the customer.

tasks.description: The system sends an email to the customer with the personalized offer.
tasks.expected_outcome: A relevant offer is delivered to the customer to encourage a repeat purchase.
